Character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Mario

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that Mario and the Enemies extend

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 boolean solid,
                 java.lang.String imageName,
                 Game game)
        Parameters:
        x - The x location on the Gameboard
        y - The y location on the Gameboard
        width - width of border collision rectangle (typically width of the image)
        height - height of border collision rectangle (typically height of the image)
        solid - True if border collision should be calculated
        imageName - The filename of the Character's ImageIcon
        game - The instance of the Game

                            Gameboard c)
        Abstract method that displays the Character on the Gameboard
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object
        c - The Gameboard to draw on

      • tick

        public abstract void tick()
        Abstract method that is called every time the game loops and is where movement happens
